DOC.brief_title: Combined Treatment Sorafenib Pegylated Interferon α2b Stage IV Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective non-randomized , multicenter Phase II Study evaluate efficacy safety combine treatment Sorafenib ( Nexavar® ) pegylated interferon-α-2b ( PegIntron® ) patient malignant melanoma stage IV . The investigator determine disease control rate ( CR , PR , SD ) 8 week treatment pegylated interferon- α-2b ( 3 µg/kg body weight s.c. week ) combine Sorafenib 2x 400 mg ( 2 tablet orally , twice daily )
